text: Hi all! This user is looking to set up a blog author page with some custom settings with images and linking: <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/Blog-Website-Page-Publishing/List-author-in-author-page-with-image-and-author-link/m-p/220943#M2088>. If you have any advice, thoughts or suggestions, it would be appreciated! :slightly_smiling_face:
